summary: Completed testing of NSTU Property Tax Manager performance optimization and core features. All 14 backend API tests passed (100%). Admin dashboard shows 459 properties and 9 employees correctly. Property Map loads all 459 markers with satellite view. Surveyor login works. API performance is excellent - properties endpoint responds in ~0.06s for 500 records.
passed_tests: Dashboard shows 459 properties and 9 employees - SUCCESS
Properties API with pagination responds in <2s - SUCCESS (0.06s)
Properties API with limit=500 responds in <3s - SUCCESS
Attendance today endpoint returns correct structure - SUCCESS
Properties have GPS coordinates for map - SUCCESS
Properties have serial numbers for markers - SUCCESS
Property Map page loads with 459 markers - SUCCESS
Property Map has satellite view option - SUCCESS
Surveyor Properties page has map with GPS tracking - SUCCESS
Survey submit requires photo validation - SUCCESS
critical_code_review_comments: MongoDB indexes created at startup for performance optimization - verified in server.py lines 54-101
Query projections optimized to return only required fields - verified in server.py lines 642-664
GPS watch frequency reduced to 100m/60s for better performance - verified in Properties.js lines 454-468
Attendance lock implemented in Survey.js - shows lock screen if attendance not marked
seed_data_creation: Assigned 5 properties to surveyor1 for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Performance optimization verified: (1) MongoDB indexes created at startup for properties, users, submissions, attendance, batches collections. (2) API response times excellent - properties endpoint ~0.06s for 500 records. (3) Property Map loads all 459 markers with satellite view. (4) Surveyor attendance lock implemented - survey form shows lock if attendance not marked. (5) GPS tracking optimized to 100m/60s updates.
